meta.title: YetiFace Games - Indie Games
meta.description: Experience the thrilling world of YetiFace - an episodic psychological horror game series featuring untold stories. Play through multiple episodes of suspense and mystery.

items.heading: Hollowbrook Appartments
items.text: Hollowbrook is a stylized horror experience told through multiple episodes. Each chapter immerses you in the life of a new character, blending personal backstories with chilling encounters that react to your decisions.

items.heading: We're working on the next game!
What is YetiFace?
items.text: Indie dev based in Wales, UK. Creating short episodic psychological horror games revealing untold stories.
